be.kuleuven.socialmap.database
Class DatabaseFactory

java.lang.Object
  be.kuleuven.socialmap.database.DatabaseFactory

public class DatabaseFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory class to create a suitable Database. See getDatabase(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Object[]).
The fully qualified class name of the DatabaseManager to be used should be specified in the 'socialmap.properties' file as the property 'databaseManager'.

Method Summary
static
<T> Database<T>
getDatabase(java.lang.Class<T> c, java.lang.Object... args)
          This method will return an appropriate Database for retrieving objects of type c.
static DatabaseManager getDatabaseManager()
          Returns the DatabaseManager that the DatabaseFactory is using.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getDatabaseManager

public static DatabaseManager getDatabaseManager()
                                          throws SocialMapException
Returns the DatabaseManager that the DatabaseFactory is using. The first time this method or getDatabase(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Object[]) is called, a new DatabaseManager will be created.

Returns:
A suitable DatabaseManager
Throws:
SocialMapException

getDatabase

public static <T> Database<T> getDatabase(java.lang.Class<T> c,
                                          java.lang.Object... args)
                               throws SocialMapException
This method will return an appropriate Database for retrieving objects of type c.

Parameters:
c - The class for which you want to get a Database object
args - Extra arguments that might be needed for the creation of the Database object
Returns:
An appropriate Database
Throws:
SocialMapException
